original_text: The father shall be divided against the son, and the son against the father; the mother against the daughter, and the daughter against the mother; the mother in law against her daughter in law, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.
korean_text: 아버지가 아들과, 아들이 아버지와, 어머니가 딸과, 딸이 어머니와, 시어머니가 며느리와, 며느리가 시어머니와 분쟁하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: The father shall be divided against the son
and the son against the father
and the daughter against the mother
the mother in law against her daughter in law
and the daughter in law against her mother in law
